languages.text: "В утробе твоей сталекрылой птицы я пережила множество путешествий сквозь вуаль, за которой Ее голос терзал и сводил меня с ума..." {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт скользит мимо вас, она сама не замечает, как касается дрожащей рукой камня душ на груди.{/n} "Ее шепот льется мне в уши каждый раз, когда я оказываюсь в варпе. Неизбывный, неумолчный, отравляющий каждый помысел и чувство, распаляющий их, делающий их неуправляемыми. Я... научилась закрывать себя. Как могу. Лишь бы иметь возможность... искать то, что было мной потеряно".

"I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."
languages.original_text: "В утробе твоей сталекрылой птицы я пережила множество путешествий сквозь вуаль, за которой Ее голос терзал и сводил меня с ума..." {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт скользит мимо вас, она сама не замечает, как касается дрожащей рукой камня душ на груди.{/n} "Ее шепот льется мне в уши каждый раз, когда я оказываюсь в варпе. Неизбывный, неумолчный, отравляющий каждый помысел и чувство, распаляющий их, делающий их неуправляемыми. Я... научилась закрывать себя. Как могу. Лишь бы иметь возможность... искать то, что было мной потеряно".

traits.locale_text: "Inside your steel-winged bird, I have travelled through the veil many times, behind which Her voice tormented me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet's gaze goes through you, she doesn't notice how her trembling hand touches the spirit stone on her chest.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I go through the warp. Inescapable, incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. The best I can. Just to have a chance to... search for what I have lost."

"Inside your steel-winged bird, I have travelled through the veil many times, behind which Her voice tormented me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet's gaze goes through you, she doesn't notice how her trembling hand touches the spirit stone on her chest.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I go through the warp. Inescapable, incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. The best I can. Just to have a chance to... search for what I have lost."

Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

"I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

languages.text: “我在你的钢翼鸟上无数次地穿越亚空间。每次穿越，她的声音都如影随形地折磨着我，想要让我陷入疯狂……”{n}伊莉耶特注视着你，不由自主地伸出颤抖的手指，抚摸着胸前的灵魂石。{/n}“每当进入亚空间，我的耳边就会响起她喋喋不休的低语，我对此无计可施。她的话语荼毒和蛊惑我的每一种情绪、每一个念头，让我失去自制。因此，我学会了……封闭我的知觉。我会尽可能与外界隔绝，这样才有机会寻找我失落的东西。”
languages.original_text: "I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

traits.locale_text: “我在你的钢翼鸟上无数次地穿越亚空间。每次穿越，她的声音都如影随形地折磨着我，想要让我陷入疯狂……”{n}伊莉耶特注视着你，不由自主地伸出颤抖的手指，抚摸着胸前的灵魂石。{/n}“每当进入亚空间，我的耳边就会响起她喋喋不休的低语，我对此无计可施。她的话语荼毒和蛊惑我的每一种情绪、每一个念头，让我失去自制。因此，我学会了……封闭我的知觉。我会尽可能与外界隔绝，这样才有机会寻找我失落的东西。”

languages.text: «Hemos atravesado muchas veces el velo dentro de tu pájaro con alas de metal, y cada vez que lo hacemos Su voz me atormenta, tratando de hacerme enloquecer...». {n}Yrliet tiene la mirada perdida, y sin darse cuenta se lleva una mano temblorosa a la joya espiritual de su pecho.{/n} «Sus susurros invaden mis oídos cada vez que entro en la disformidad. Ineludible e incesante, envenena e inflama todas mis emociones y pensamientos, volviéndolos incontrolables. He... aprendido a aislarme. Tanto como me resulta posible. Todo con tal de tener una oportunidad para... buscar lo que he perdido».
languages.original_text: "I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos atravesado muchas veces el velo dentro de tu pájaro con alas de metal, y cada vez que lo hacemos Su voz me atormenta, tratando de hacerme enloquecer...». {n}Yrliet tiene la mirada perdida, y sin darse cuenta se lleva una mano temblorosa a la joya espiritual de su pecho.{/n} «Sus susurros invaden mis oídos cada vez que entro en la disformidad. Ineludible e incesante, envenena e inflama todas mis emociones y pensamientos, volviéndolos incontrolables. He... aprendido a aislarme. Tanto como me resulta posible. Todo con tal de tener una oportunidad para... buscar lo que he perdido».

languages.text: « J'ai traversé le voile à de nombreuses reprises à bord de votre oiseau d'acier, et à chaque fois, Sa voix me tourmente, essaie de me plonger dans la folie... » {n}Le regard lointain, Yrliet pose machinalement une main tremblante sur sa pierre-esprit.{/n} « Elle ne cesse de murmurer à mon oreille chaque fois que je pénètre dans le Warp. Je ne peux y échapper ; ses chuchotis incessants empoisonnent et enflamment toutes mes pensées et émotions, les rendant incontrôlables. J'ai appris à... me fermer totalement. Du moins, comme je le peux. Afin d'avoir au moins une chance de partir à la recherche de ce que j'ai perdu. »
languages.original_text: "I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai traversé le voile à de nombreuses reprises à bord de votre oiseau d'acier, et à chaque fois, Sa voix me tourmente, essaie de me plonger dans la folie... » {n}Le regard lointain, Yrliet pose machinalement une main tremblante sur sa pierre-esprit.{/n} « Elle ne cesse de murmurer à mon oreille chaque fois que je pénètre dans le Warp. Je ne peux y échapper ; ses chuchotis incessants empoisonnent et enflamment toutes mes pensées et émotions, les rendant incontrôlables. J'ai appris à... me fermer totalement. Du moins, comme je le peux. Afin d'avoir au moins une chance de partir à la recherche de ce que j'ai perdu. »

languages.text: "Ich bin in Eurem Stahlflügelvogel viele Male durch den Schleier gereist, und jedes Mal quält mich Ihre Stimme und will mich in den Wahnsinn treiben ..." {n}Yrliet starrt durch dich hindurch und berührt mit zitternder Hand den Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust.{/n} "Ihr Flüstern erfüllt meine Ohren, wann immer ich in den Warp eintrete. Unausweichlich und unaufhörlich werden alle Gefühle und Gedanken vergiftet und in Brand gesetzt, sodass sie unkontrollierbar werden. Ich habe gelernt ... mich zu verschließen. So gut ich kann. Damit ich weiterhin die Chance habe ... zu suchen, was ich verloren habe."
languages.original_text: "I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin in Eurem Stahlflügelvogel viele Male durch den Schleier gereist, und jedes Mal quält mich Ihre Stimme und will mich in den Wahnsinn treiben ..." {n}Yrliet starrt durch dich hindurch und berührt mit zitternder Hand den Seelenstein auf ihrer Brust.{/n} "Ihr Flüstern erfüllt meine Ohren, wann immer ich in den Warp eintrete. Unausweichlich und unaufhörlich werden alle Gefühle und Gedanken vergiftet und in Brand gesetzt, sodass sie unkontrollierbar werden. Ich habe gelernt ... mich zu verschließen. So gut ich kann. Damit ich weiterhin die Chance habe ... zu suchen, was ich verloren habe."

languages.text: 「私はあなたの鋼翼の鳥の中で何度もヴェールを旅してきた。そしてその度に彼女の声は私を苦しめ、狂わせようとするのだ…」{n}ユリエットはあなたを見つめ、無意識に震える手で胸の魂縛石に触れている。{/n}「ワープに入る度に彼女のささやきが私の耳を満たす。逃れられず、絶え間なく、あらゆる感情や思考を毒し、煽り、制御不能にする。私は…自分自身を遮断することを学んだ。できる限りそうしてきた。失ったものを探し求めるチャンスを得るためだ」
languages.original_text: "I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."

traits.locale_text: 「私はあなたの鋼翼の鳥の中で何度もヴェールを旅してきた。そしてその度に彼女の声は私を苦しめ、狂わせようとするのだ…」{n}ユリエットはあなたを見つめ、無意識に震える手で胸の魂縛石に触れている。{/n}「ワープに入る度に彼女のささやきが私の耳を満たす。逃れられず、絶え間なく、あらゆる感情や思考を毒し、煽り、制御不能にする。私は…自分自身を遮断することを学んだ。できる限りそうしてきた。失ったものを探し求めるチャンスを得るためだ」

languages.text: "Senin çelik kanatlı kuşunla örtünün ötesine birçok kez seyahat ettim. Her seferinde O'nun sesi bana eziyet etti, beni delirtmeye çalıştı..." {n}Yrliet'in bakışları içini delip geçiyor. Farkında olmadan titrek elleriyle göğsündeki ruh taşına dokunuyor.{/n} "Öteboyuta her girdiğimde fısıltıları kulaklarıma doluyor. Kaçınılmaz ve sürekli, her bir duygu ve düşüncemi zehirleyerek kışkırtıyor, onları kontrol edemememi sağlıyor. Kendimi elimden geldiğince susturmayı öğrendim. Böylece belki kaybettiklerimi aramak için şansım döner."
languages.original_text: "I have travelled through the veil many times inside your steel-winged bird, and every time Her voice torments me, trying to drive me mad..." {n}Yrliet stares through you, unconsciously touching the spirit stone on her chest with a trembling hand.{/n} "Her whispers fill my ears each time I enter the warp. Inescapable and incessant, poisoning and inflaming every single emotion and thought, making them uncontrollable. I have... learned to shut myself off. As best I can. Just so that I might have the chance to... search for what I have lost."
